flag.name: wxRA_SPECIFY_ROWS
flag.description: The major dimension parameter refers to the maximum number of rows.

flag.name: wxRA_SPECIFY_COLS
flag.description: The major dimension parameter refers to the maximum number of columns.

int.name: dimension
int.description: Specifies the maximum number of rows (if style contains wxRA_SPECIFY_ROWS) or columns (if style contains wxRA_SPECIFY_COLS) for a two-dimensional radiobox (default: 1).

int.name: selection
int.description: Index of the initially selected item or -1 for no selection (default: -1).

items.name: content
items.description: Content of the control; this property has any number of >item< XML elements as its children, with the items text as their text values (see below; default: empty).

type.name: EVT_RADIOBOX
type.description: Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_RADIOBOX_SELECTED event, when a radiobutton is clicked.

string.name: tooltip
string.description: Tooltip to show over this ratio button (default: none).

string.name: helptext
string.label: Help text
string.description: Contextual help for this radio button (default: none).
